body_html:
@danmaane I guess Jenkins only listens to admins, could you run this again?

By the way, why not let anyone ask Jenkins to run tests? Or at least the author of a PR after some form of admin approval?

body:
@danmaane I guess Jenkins only listens to admins, could you run this again?

By the way, why not let anyone ask Jenkins to run tests? Or at least the author of a PR after some form of admin approval?
